name: Bitcoin Stamps Consensus Block Milestones
description: Authoritative list of Bitcoin Stamps protocol activation blocks and consensus rules

CP_STAMP_GENESIS_BLOCK.description: Block height of first valid stamp transaction on counterparty
CP_STAMP_GENESIS_BLOCK.creator: mikeinspace

CP_SRC20_GENESIS_BLOCK.description: Initial start of SRC-20 on Counterparty (KEVIN token)
CP_SRC20_GENESIS_BLOCK.creator: arwyn

CP_SRC721_GENESIS_BLOCK.description: Block height of first SRC-721 NFT

BTC_SRC20_GENESIS_BLOCK.description: Block height of first SRC-20 without CP encoding (direct Bitcoin)

BTC_SRC101_GENESIS_BLOCK.description: Block height of first SRC-101 naming protocol

CP_SRC20_END_BLOCK.description: The last SRC-20 on CP - IGNORE ALL SRC-20 on counterparty AFTER THIS BLOCK
CP_SRC20_END_BLOCK.note: This is NOT a protocol enhancement - it's a consensus rule to ignore CP SRC-20 after this block

CP_P2WSH_FEAT_BLOCK_START.description: OLGA / P2WSH transactions enabled on stamps

BTC_SRC20_OLGA_BLOCK.description: Block height of first SRC-20 with P2WSH OLGA encoding

kevin_era.description: SRC-20 token ecosystem birth with KEVIN

efficiency_era.description: OLGA optimization and cost reduction focus

common_mistakes.796000_is_not_enhancement: Block 796,000 is NOT a protocol enhancement - it's the Counterparty SRC-20 cutoff. Do not describe it as an upgrade or improvement.
common_mistakes.olga_has_two_phases: OLGA has two phases: P2WSH enabled at 833,000 and full launch at 865,000

cultural_context.kevin_importance: KEVIN token at block 788,041 is the foundational cultural icon - always emphasize its pioneering role
cultural_context.fair_launch_principle: All protocols emphasize fair launch without pre-mines or insider allocations
